practice_phrases: I'll ask him
我会问他
I'll ask him tomorrow
我明天会问他
I'll ask him when I see him
我见到他时会问他
I'll ask him what he thinks
我会问他他怎么想
I'll ask him if he's available
我会问他他是否有空
I'll ask him about it later today
我今天晚些时候会问他
I'll ask him when he gets back from work
我会在他下班回来时问他
I'll ask him if he can help us tomorrow
我会问他明天能否帮我们
I'll ask him what time would be best for everyone
我会问他什么时间对大家最合适
I'll ask him to join us for dinner tonight
我会邀请他今晚和我们一起吃饭

lego: if he'll be able to help next year
practice_phrases: if he'll be able to help next year

practice_phrases: next year
明年
I'm going to Japan next year
我明年要去日本
We'll move to a new house next year
我们明年会搬到新房子
She's planning to study abroad next year
她计划明年出国留学
Next year will be better I think
我觉得明年会更好
Are you coming back to visit next year
你明年会回来看看吗

我希望明年之前完成这个项目
We're saving money to buy a car next year
我们在存钱明年买车
I'll have more free time to travel next year hopefully
希望明年我会有更多空闲时间旅行
